title: Bazaar Game
description: Distributed multiplayer board game with client-server architecture
longDescription: Implemented the complete board game Bazaar including automated gameplay with deterministic player strategies. Built a distributed system using client-server architecture, allowing players to interact in real-time across nodes.
captions: An example game state for visualizing tests
Diagram of communication between referee, player, and observer components
Diagram of state machine that turns follow

title: SigLo
description: Computer vision system for gesture-based computer control
longDescription: Adapted a pre-trained neural network to identify hand motions to control a computer from afar. Uses OpenCV and MediaPipe for real-time hand tracking and gesture recognition.

title: RecoverWE & Help App
description: Mobile apps providing recovery resources for a New Jersey non-profit
longDescription: Developed two mobile applications for a New Jersey based non-profit to provide addiction recovery resources in an easily accessible format. Built with React Native for cross-platform compatibility and Python backend and SQL database for data management.

title: Image Processing Application
description: Advanced image manipulation tool with custom filters and effects
longDescription: Built a comprehensive image processing application that enables users to load, save, and manipulate images with various operations including flipping, resizing, and applying custom filters.

title: VMware Workflow Debugger
description: Internal tool for parsing and analyzing log bundles
longDescription: Developed a workflow debugging tool at VMware that parses internal and external log bundles, gathers key analytics, assesses long-term performance, and helps locate bugs and regressions.

title: Cromwell
description: Implementation of new WDL spec on Cromwell
longDescription: Implemented support for a new WDL (Workflow Descriptor Language) specification in Cromwell, a workflow execution engine at the Broad Institute. Also discovered and fixed a bug in the integration testing framework.
